name: Super Growing Bros - Alakajam #3
description:
Created for Alakajam #3 - Always Growing.

The idea is that you are Gario, a clumsy distant cousin of a famous plumber, that stumble onto a stash of super Mushrooms. After eating a couple of dozens of them, Gario started to feel bigger and bigger.

Control Gario by moving his head, hands and foot by using the mouse pointer and pressing  the following keys :

Q  : Right hand
W : Head
E  : Left hand
A : Right foot
D : Left foot

Try to limit the damage caused by Gario's mistake !

**Since I started the jam 30h hours late, the game is far from completed. I was able to code the basic game mechanic. The idea was to add collateral, other characters that you need to protect, as you try to limit the damage to a minimum.
